attributes.action: Schools be closed on friday to help cope with mental struggles caused by school
attributes.additional_details: If the government were to do this it would not only allow for a healthier mental state for all students but also allow students to have more free time to spend being children instead of having to be sat in rows like factories
attributes.background: By closing schools on fridays it allows students to rehabilitate from the stress caused by schools including on going pressure due to exams

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614046
